column3: It seems `interface_bitcoin_cli.py` is broken in AppVeyor now.
Normally ignoring AppVeyor failures isn't a huge issue, but this PR changed `test/config.ini.in`.

Can this be replaced with an `assert_equal` test? That makes it easier to debug whether there's a problem with the testsuite or the binary in AppVeyor.\n(most likely the problem is with the test, since this PR only touched the test)
You probably need to add something here, though I'm not sure what:\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/.appveyor.yml#L41-L48
Note that in other places `self` is left out, e.g. `'/src/bitcoind' + config["environment"]["EXEEXT"]`

assert_equal doesn't work because the version is suffixed by the commit

```
$ ./src/bitcoin-cli -version
Bitcoin Core RPC client version v0.18.99.0-b1e013e4fa
I guess you could strip the commit, but :man_shrugging:
